org.fao.oekc.autotagger.util

Class TxtNewLineReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fao.oekc.autotagger.util.TxtNewLineReader

  • public class TxtNewLineReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Parse a text file whose lines have been grouped by new line and each group ends with a "@" line. The key of each group is the first line
    Author:
    fabrizio celli
